column5: Hi all,  Has anyone ever used lead core to tie a worm harness?  Thanks for your input.  Doug
Works fantastic for walleye on Lake Erie!  ***Edit***  Ahhh, are you thinking to use the leadcore AS your worm harness? If so, I don't think there would be enough lead to make it worth the effort.
Clevises wouldn't spin free enough on lead core. Use 15 Lb. flor carb line, 2to3 ft. up split shot or snap weight.
